meta.label: Project Gutenberg Book
meta.description:
Downloads books from the Gutenberg Project. 
Each row of the dataset is a line of the book. 

 Mirror list available at https://www.gutenberg.org/MIRRORS.ALL

params.name: mirror
params.label: Mirror from which we download the book

params.name: extract_metadata
params.label: Extract metadata and clean headers
params.description: This functionnality is experimental, it could give wrong metadata and remove text. Use caution.
